actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that no roll call or quorum call shall be conducted by electronic device after the House has entered into special orders after the conclusion of the legislative program and business on any day.

summary.text: Provides that no roll call or quorum call shall be conducted by electronic device after the House of Representatives has entered into special orders after the conclusion of the legislative program and business on any day.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that no roll call or quorum call shall be conducted by electronic device after the House has entered into special orders after the conclusion of the legislative program and business on any day.
